column4: I don't want to keep asking the same question over and over, but hopefully somone can help with my Vostro blues :)
has anyone tried installing on DELL Vostro 200?
what exactly are you interested in finding out
at what point does it reboot.
> when booting with the APCI (I think) disabled option I get "ata.001 revalidation failed error no = -5"
that should signify issues with your sata controller... but I'm not well versed in those areas
